text: ovunta sthira vu svargayan æta. evayehi diya dahara sadakal gala basiminma ætteya. ehi ovunta (tyaga vasayen) ran abharana palandavanu læbe. itamat mrdu ho ghanakamin ho (ovun kæmati) kola varnayen yut pata sela handinu æta. ehi æti asanayanhi æti kotta mata hansi vi (itamat satutin) sitinu æta. movunge phalavipaka itamat aganeya! movun suvaya vindina sthanayada itamat alamkaravatya
